alert.note: Alert for Hancock; McDonough (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:00PM CST until January 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle or freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a glaze. * WHERE...Hancock and McDonough Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Any freezing rain will transition to rain as temperatures gradually warm late tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
